**High Supreme Daoist Scripture of the Celestial Palace: The *Zishu* Scripture of the High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Jade Purity**

**Author Unknown**, composed approximately in the late Northern Song or early Southern Song dynasty.
A scripture of the **Shenxiao** Daoist sect. Twelve volumes.
Source of the base text: *Zhengtong Daozang* Canon, First Proper Division.

**Preface to the *Zishu* Scripture of the High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Celestial Palace**

In antiquity, before the **Great Void** (*Taikong*) was formed and the **original *qi*** (*yuánqì*) emerged,
the **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** (*Yuánshǐ Tiānwáng*), as progenitor of the **vast and boundless Great Brahman** (*hàománg dàfán*), condensed his spirit and conceived a form, named it **Hundun** (混沌).
When **Hundun** was dispersed, the **original *qi*** of heaven and earth, within and without, was manifest—then called **Hunxu** (混虚).
The **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign**, through his transformative power, unfolded the cosmic pattern.
His golden visage shone like the sun, his jade likeness radiated like the heavens.
He nurtured the **wondrous essence** (*miàojīng*), partitioning the **Heavenly and Earthly** (*qiánkūn*).
Thus, descending from the **Jade Capital** (*Yùjīng*) mountain and ascending through the celestial realms,
he encountered the **Primordial Mother of Ten Thousand *Qi*** (*Tà Xuán Yùjí Yuánjǐng Zìrán Jiǔtiān Shàng Xuán Yùqīng Shénmǔ*), the **Great Ancestral Mother of the Nine Heavens**,
and practiced the **Dao of the Great Cavern of the High Supreme Purity** (*Shàngqīng Dàdòng Cīxióng Sānyī Hùnhuà*), the **triune unity of yin and yang**,
and bore eight children.

The eldest was the **Long-Lived Sovereign of the Southern Extremity** (*Nánjí Chángshēng Dàdì*), also known as the **Great Sovereign of the Nine Dragons and the Fuxi Sun Palace** (*Jiǔlóng Fúsāng Rìgōng Dàdì*), also known as the **High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Jade Purity** (*Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Wáng*).
One body, three names—his holiness is singular.

The **High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Celestial Palace** (*Shénxiāo Zhēnwáng*), with his spirit condensed at the **Golden Gate** (*Jīnquè*),
reflected upon the world and all beings,
the **three calamities and eight hardships** (*sānzāi bānàn*) of all suffering,
the **nine abyssal prisons and the Green Anticipation** (*jiǔyōu quánchéng*), where all guilty souls endure retribution,
the endless torments that never cease day or night,
the **cyclic wheel of birth and death** (*shēngsǐ wǎnglái*).
Now, with my **divine powers** (*shéntōnglì*), I pity all beings in the **Three Realms** (*sānjiè*),
and thus proceed to the **Jade Purity Heaven** (*Yùqīng Tiān*), beneath the **Golden Gate of the Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** (*Yuánshǐ Shàngdì Jīnquè*).
With reverent offerings, I beseech the **Purple Microstar Celestial Palace** (*Zǐwēi Shànggōng*), the **Purple Jade and Precious Orchid** (*Zǐyù Qióngruǐ*) scriptures,
and within the **Nine Heavens Treasure Register** (*Jiǔxiāo Bǎogǔ*), I request the **Secret Dao of the High Supreme Sovereign** (*Shénxiāo Zhēnwáng Mìfǎ*), three volumes in total,
all composed of **Brahmanic *qi*** (*fánqì*), the **scriptures of the Nine Heavens’ Great Primordial Clouds and Mist** (*Jiǔtiān Tà Xuán Yúnxiá*).
The **uppermost** (*shàng*) conceals the **prohibitions of the Ten Thousand Heavens** (*wàn tiān zhǐjìn*);
the **middle** (*zhōng*) conceals the **Dao of immortality spanning Ten Thousand Years** (*shénxiān wànián fǎ*).

The **lower** (*xià*) reveals the **Dao of governing humanity and pacifying ghosts**—securing the state and bringing peace to the family.

The **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** thus decreed to the **Supreme Lord of Ten Thousand Blessings, the True Prince** (*Tàihuáng Wànfú Zhēnjūn*), to transmit the **High Supreme Sovereign’s Secret Dao of the Jade Pure Palace for Long Life and Protection of Life** (*Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Wáng Chángshēng Hùmìng Fǎ*) to the mortal realm, first instructing me to propagate it among those in the world who seek the **Dao**, so that they may **wear the law and cultivate**, making it a lasting treasure for their bodies.

Above, it **defends emperors and kings**, stabilizing the land and ensuring a reign of **ten thousand years**.
Below, it **benefits the people**, extending life and delivering them from calamity, so that those who study the **Dao** may attain its truth.

With **face-bowed reverence to the True King**, one **drives away the Six Heavens** and **subdues demons and spirits**.
It is used to **issue talismans and edicts**, summoning and binding ghosts and gods.

As the **High Supreme Sovereign** has commanded, and as the **hundreds of millions of ancestors**—the **lineage of the sacred lineage and kindred spirits**—have ascended beyond suffering, one’s **single body is blessed**, and **ten thousand generations enjoy honor**.

Next, it enables the practitioner to **attain the Dao**, achieving **corporeal ascension and hidden transcendence**, ensuring its transmission through generations, with the **law safeguarded** so that the **Dao may flourish**.
Those who **leak, reveal, or grow lax**—facing the **Wind Knife Trial**—shall not be pardoned even after **ten thousand kalpas**.
Scholars who practice this must **strictly adhere** to it.

---
**The Great Dao Source of the Supreme Law**
**Volume One of the Purple Scripture Great Law of the High Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Pure Palace**

Within the **Great Luo Purple Treasury of the Nine Heavens**, there exist **all the celestial bureaus**.
The **assemblies of the Celestial Emperors**, the **Heavenly Sovereign’s Gate**—with **twelve thousand eight hundred** subordinate domains, each with its officials—**examine the virtues and transgressions of mortals**, recording none in official registers, yet all as **retribution or reward**.
Thus, **poverty and wealth, nobility and ignominy, longevity and early death** are not granted or withheld by decree, but arise entirely from **one’s own karmic summoning and response**.

These bureaus and gates **acknowledge the Jade Emperor of the Boundless Heaven as their sovereign**.
Yet the **High Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Pure Palace**, now commissioned by the Jade Emperor as the **Human Sovereign**, oversees the **Jade Pure Bureau of the High Supreme Sovereign**.
Moreover, he governs **all earthly mountain and ghostly spirits**, differing from the **edicts of the Great Emperor of the Northern Pole, the Purple Microstar**, and is not the **mixed primal virtue of the Supreme Emperor’s Three Heavens Exalted Teaching and Auxiliary Dao Master’s secret scriptures**.

Now, the **celestial officials of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Jade Pure Bureau** oversee the **seals of the earthly ghosts and spirits**, along with the **Spirit Officials and celestial attendants**, the **messengers and generals**, the **diverse-named Jade Officials**, and the **summoned spirit texts**.
This law must be practiced on the **third day of each lunar nine-day period**, when the **celestial officials of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Palace descend to the mortal assembly**. One must **abstain from meat, alcohol, and carnal desires**, observing strict fasting—**this must be observed with utmost care**.

**On the Scriptures**
The **Seven Stages of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Dao Scriptures** are now transmitted to the mortal world.

Since ancient times, it has never descended to manifest itself. Now those who obtain it shall **exalt their bodies and preserve their lives**, **cross calamities and extend their years**. Those who revere it shall receive blessings from the **celestial officials**, **dispel calamities and avert misfortune**. Those who practice it shall **repel and extinguish malevolent spirits**, **severely punish demons**. The **worthy and virtuous** must first **pledge allegiance to the Dao of the Spirit Palace**, **petition the High Supreme Sovereign**, and await the **divine response** before they may **revere and practice it**. They must not **transgress or recklessly employ** it. It is most fitting to **strictly adhere to its precepts**.

**On the Secret Keys**
The **Spirit Palace’s Dao Scriptures**, the **Jade Pure Bureau’s Secret Keys**, encompass **all matters without exception**, **all beings without fail**. If one **preserves oneself and upholds them faithfully**, then **sitting in stillness, all wonders manifest**; **standing, all spirits obey**. In **tranquility and motionless repose**, one **feels and attains communion**—this is unlike all other **Dao laws**, and no **seal scriptures** compare to it. If the **worthy and virtuous** encounter this **transmission across the eons**, with **fate and fortune** aligned, **boundless and eternal**, how can they not **strive with utmost sincerity** to **invoke the True One’s blessings**? If they **begin with diligence but falter at the end**, **speaking falsely while harboring deceit**, the **Spirit Officials and celestial attendants** within the **Dao laws** shall **record their merits and demerits without fail**. At that time, the **Three Officials** shall **severely judge** them with their **divine tablets**. They must not **reveal these to the unworthy**—is this not something to be **held in utmost reverence**? **Exhortation and warning** are given.

**On the Wondrous Intent**
The **Spirit Palace’s Secret Scriptures**, the **Jade Officials’ Wondrous Intent**, are **profound mysteries**, difficult to fathom. Though there are **secret scriptures** to be studied and practiced according to their **prescribed methods**, there are no **essential keys or core principles**—like garments **cut but never sewn**, how could they be worn? The **key** is the **sewing**. Now, the **eternal secret scriptures** are revealed to the **learned and true**. If one **persists with unwavering resolve**, **aligns their heart with the Dao**, **uses the scriptures to sever malevolence**, and **returns to the True Path**, the **celestial soldiers** shall **assist and follow**. Day by day, month by month, one may **ascend to the Spirit Palace’s realm**. When **merits are fulfilled and name is established**, they shall **rise to the House of Boundless Eons**. Now these are **laid out to the left**—how can one not **ponder deeply and follow them with conviction**?

**On the Dao Law**
The **Spirit Palace’s Dao Law** was **hidden within the Jade Hall**, never revealed to the mortal world. Now, in the **auspicious cycle of the Jia-Xin years**, when the **Dao Sovereign** assumes **human leadership**, the **mysteries of the Dao** are **unveiled in this era**, and the **spirit scriptures** are **bestowed upon the treasure seals**, regardless of rank, for **reverence and practice**. Though **investigated and expounded**, they **differ from all other Dao laws**, and no **seal scriptures** are alike. But if one **sincerely invokes** with **unfailing devotion**, **peacefully practices** while **awaiting divine response**, the **merits and rewards** shall be **equal to the deeds**. They must not **arbitrarily invoke guilt from ghosts and spirits**. If they **follow the precepts and treat accordingly**, they may **rely on their merits and virtues** to **redeem themselves**, so that **both the living and the dead** may **all benefit from their virtue**. How could this be called **a minor supplement**?

**Oath and Ritual Procedure**
For those who practice this **Dao law**, on the **third day of each lunar nine-day period**, when the **celestial officials of the Spirit Palace** descend to the world, they must **use three lamps**, **twelve sheets of yellow paper**, and **compose a petition** to be **sealed with the Jade Seal** and **enclosed**. The words shall be **offered to the High Supreme Sovereign**. After burning the words, they must **prepare incense, tea, alcohol, and fruits**, **offering them with utmost sincerity**, then **extinguish the lamps and collect the ashes**. If they **receive a divine response**, then they may **practice the law**. The **Heavenly Sovereign of the Primordial Beginning** declares: *"I save the Supreme Sovereign of the Ten Thousand Blessings, opening the **Nine Pure Eons of the Purple Sky** and the **Ninefold Mysteries of the Spirit Palace**. I entrust them to the **Heavenly Sovereign’s eldest son**, so that he may **unveil the heavenly winds**, **transmit and guide the world’s people**, and **point them toward the True Dao**. Those who obtain it shall **ascend to the Celestial Realm** themselves. The **Ninefold Radiance of the Primordial Qi** has **eighty-one repetitions**, which is the **cycle of the Great Sun**. The **Sovereign of the Great Sun’s Ninefold Radiance and the Mulberry Tree of the East** accumulates **qi into the Spirit Palace’s True Sovereign**. He also **leads the duties of the Southern Pole**, together with **Han the Official of the Furnace**, in **molding the Heavenly People**, all **attaining the Nine Heavens**. Thus, they obtain the **Spirit Palace’s Forbidden Seal Scriptures** and the **Heavenly Seal of the Spirit Palace**, and on the appointed day, they **ascend to the Spirit Palace**."*

The **"Scripture of the Jade Hall"** comprehensively records **treasures that lead to ascension**, containing **ten grades of methods**. If one encounters this **scripture**, they shall **register their name in the Eastern Jade Hall**, and on the appointed day, they shall **ascend to the True Realm**. This **scripture** is **guarded by ten thousand Golden Spirit Children** and **one thousand Heavenly Pure Consorts**, who **constantly protect it**. When **incense is burned and scriptures are scattered**, they **record merits and demerits**. If there is **any slight transgression**, even the **Seven Ancestors** shall **suffer the divine punishment of the Spirit Prison**. The **transmitters** shall **deliver it with a Golden Dragon and Jade Fish’s Forbidden Brocade Seal**, **pledging allegiance to the Ten Heavens**. If one **breaks the fast or recklessly reveals** it, both **master and disciple** shall **share the same guilt**, and the **Seven Ancestors** shall **enter the Northern Capital**, where **ten thousand laws** shall **not pardon them**. This is the **pledge and warning** for the **worthy**.

**The Heavenly People’s Fasting with Rice Gruel**
The **hundred grains and five flavors** enter the **spleen and stomach**. The **five viscera** are **calmed and at peace**, and the **corporeal demons** are **dispelled and annihilated**. The **Seven Ancestors** ascend to **Heaven**, and the **minor worthy** attain **ascension**. **Long life** is **achieved within the Nine Pure Eons**, and **enduring vision** is **communed with the Holy Wisdom**. **Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **High Supreme Spirit Palace’s Eastern Jade Ascension Sovereign** decrees: *"This law is taken from the **Eastern Jade Qi**. Again, the **qi is blown**, harmonizing the **hundred bones and nine orifices**, and **dispelling the Three Corpses and Nine Worms**."*

**The Heavenly People’s Hair-Combing Method**
The **mud pellet at the Jade Vertex** and the **precious essence of the Vermilion Chamber and Mysterious Palace**—the **Heavenly Sovereign’s divine countenance** is **eternally preserved**, and the **divine light of the Sage Forest** is **manifested**. The **right** is the **Hidden Moon**, and the **left** is the **Hidden Sun**. The **six directions are purified**, and the **hundred spirits are transformed**. **Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **High Supreme Spirit Palace’s Great Sovereign** decrees: *"This law is to be practiced **facing the direction of the Heavenly Qi**. One must **blow the qi** and then **combine the hair**. The **white strands become qi**, bringing **great auspiciousness and prosperity**."*

**The Heavenly People’s Washing and Adorning with Headgear**
The **Heavenly Pure Jade Crown** and the **Cloud Robes with Glow of the Morning Mist**—the **Tiger Skirt subdues demons**, and the **Golden Elixir is refined**. The **five turbidities** are **rapidly dispelled**, and the **eight scenes** are **radiant**. The **ministers receive their blessings**, and their **guilt is erased while their fortune is enhanced**. They **ascend with the Spirit Palace**, **equally attaining the True and Holy**. **Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Five Sovereigns of the High Supreme Spirit Palace** decree: *"This law is to be practiced **from the month of the Heavenly Pure Maiden downward**, with **Jade Boys standing in attendance**. One must **blow the Heavenly Qi** into the **water** before **washing and adorning**."*

**The Heavenly People’s Mouth and Hand Washing**
The **Heavenly Pure and Earthly Bright**, the **Sun and Moon radiant in the morning**—they **purify my five senses**, and the **light shines upon the Jade Pure**.

The **Qi** does not receive defilement; the **five viscera** flourish in splendor.
Guilt vanishes from the **Northern Capital**, calamity is extinguished in the **Nine True Regions**.
Evil and malevolence are subdued and hidden; fortune connects with the **Upper Pure**.
Today’s **refined bathing**—all receive blessings.
The body generates **feathered robes**, ascending into the **Imperial Court**.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Southern Pole Long-Life Great Emperor** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
Close your eyes, and visualize the **Immortal’s Five-Colored Cloud Robes**, the **Four Beasts—Lion, White Crane**—before you. Let the radiance of the **Sun and Moon** enter the water.
Knock the teeth **thirty-six times**, face east, and draw the **Qi**, blowing it into the water.
First, swallow one mouthful, then use it.

---

**The Heavenly People’s Entry and Exit Ritual**
Serve and assist the **Jade Pure**, donning the **Paramartic Tiger**.
Exit with the **Sun**, enter with the **Moon**, opening the **Eight Scenes of Clarity**.
The **Six Jia** follow the **Divine**, the **Six Ding** march in attendance.
You align with the **Heavenly and Earthly**, supporting the **Hook-and-Arrow** constellations.
The **Seven Stars** guard and protect; a hundred blessings ensure **Long Life**.
The **Five Thunder Armies** stand with the **Ranks of Pure Immortals**.
Knives, swords, water, and fire **depart from your form**.
If you violate this **Heavenly Decree**, the **Kui and Gang** will act.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Jade Pure Exorcising-Demon Emperor** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
Early, draw in the **Sun’s Light**; late, draw in the **Moon’s Light**—one mouthful each—blowing it to the left and right.
Ward off **evil, calamities, and malevolent people**; sever **slanderous curses**.

---

**The Heavenly People’s Undressing Ritual**
Receiving the **Heavenly Emperor’s Command**, ascending to the **Nine Heavens**.
A hundred spirits take their positions, arrayed in attendance upon the **Immortal**.
**Soul and vital essence** harmonize and soften; the **five viscera** flourish in abundance.
A hundred limbs generate **vital fluids**; the **Seven Essences** fill with luminosity.
The **Fire Order** radiates brilliance, vanquishing ghosts and dispelling misfortune.
Above, you aspire to the **Spirit Palace**, the **Divine Storehouse of Eternal Truth**.
For **countless kalpas**, you roam in splendor, bold and boundless.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Taiwei Heavenly Emperor** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
Knock the **Heavenly Bell** three times with the left hand, the **Heavenly Chime** three times with the right, and strike the **Law Drum** three times in the center.
Undress, visualizing the **Taiwei Void Sovereign’s Chamber**, then lie down.
This will make the body **vital and healthy**, free from illness, with auspicious responses.

---

**The Heavenly People’s Outer Exorcism Spell**
Heaven has **nine stars**, Earth has **nine palaces**.
I have **nine orifices**, ten thousand spirits follow.
The **Three Corpses** are subdued and extinguished; the **five viscera** flow freely.
The **Three Fields and Four Limbs** move and rest in the **Center**.
The **Eight Trigrams’ Dragons and Tigers** come to attend my body.
Demons, spirits, and a hundred evils **do not dare approach**.
The **True Officials** maintain solemnity; **evil dreams** do not intrude.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Spirit Palace Exorcising-Demon King** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
Draw the **Long-Life Vital Qi** from the **Cao**, swallow it, and strike the **Law Drum** three times, then cast it outward at will.

---

**The Heavenly People’s Illness and Medicine Spell**
Respectfully summon the **Highest Spirit Palace’s Eastern Hua Five Spirits**, calling forth the **Heavenly Physician, the True God Bian Que**, and their **clerks—fifty each**.
When the **small talisman** is taken with medicine, the body **separates from illness**; the illness swiftly departs.
Riding the **Kui** and **Gang**, ascending to the **Nine Heavens**.
Counting through the **Nine Earths**, **lifespan and fortune** both flourish.
**Long Life and eternal vision**, never dying in sorrow.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Spirit Palace Long-Life Emperor** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
Draw the **Cao** and take the **Spirit Palace Qi**, blowing it over the medicine before giving it to the person.
This will **remove illness and calamity**, dispel chronic ailments.
It will **extend life and increase years**, always in accordance with this.

---

**The Heavenly People’s Entry into Filth and Darkness Ritual**
Left: **Virtue of the Pure Spirit**; Right: **Command of the Heavenly True**.
Left: **Lady of the Earthly Officials**; Right: **Five Ding of Exorcising Filth**.
Order my **death register** to be erased, and my **name** recorded in the **Jade Registry**.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Spirit Palace Thunder Department’s Exorcising-Evil King** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
When arriving at filth, first raise your left hand to support the **Sun and Moon**, visualizing the **Five Ding Officials**, knock the teeth **seven times**, draw the **Northern Qi**, blow it upon yourself, then enter the **dark and filthy place**.

---

**The Ten-Thousand-Word Exorcising-Demon Spell of Wisdom**
The **Spirit Palace’s Green Emperor** refines truth in the **Eastern Well**.
The **Dan Palace’s Primordial Immortal** guards and preserves in unity.
The **nine orifices** flow freely; the **Linglang** extinguishes the **Sun**.
The light penetrates the **Azure Depths**; the **Mystic Mystic** communicates across distances.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—invoking the **Mahasattva of the Sun and Moon Wind**, as the **Eastern Well Emperor** decrees.

**The Talisman:**
Used on a **Wuwu day**, grind **Dan** with **play pearl blood**, facing east while reciting the spell, written on **yellow paper**.
Chew **Gulu** daily, swallowing it with **Eastern Well water**.
After a hundred days, the mind opens.
Recite the **Ten-Thousand-Word Spell** daily; **Heaven-born wisdom** emerges.
The **divine mind** wanders not; **inner clarity** is revealed.

---

**The Cold Filth Talisman**
Decree to the **Azure Sky’s Purple Mist Primordial Awakening Spirit General**, aiding my **True Qi** to sever all inauspiciousness.
**Li’s Emperor** arrives, carrying out the decree to subdue.
**The Talisman:**
Sever and dispel **ten thousand filths and a thousand evils**, either worn or affixed.
If **evil, malevolence, or pests** are present, swallow it for immediate effect.
Take the **Qi from the Dipper** and inscribe it.
If **official disputes or slander** threaten, or if **malevolent people plot harm**, wearing it will grant immunity.

---

**The Transforming Spirit Spell**
Highest True Salvation, donning the **Star and Jade**.
Left: **Thunder**; Right: **Lightning**; riding the **Dragon and Tiger**, the **wicked are annihilated**, the **virtuous nurtured**.
Reverently offering to the **Jade Emperor**, the **form and spirit transform swiftly**.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Highest Spirit Palace Jade Pure King** decrees.

**The Ritual:**
After reciting the spell, cast the **seal**.
Visualize the **Jade Boys and Girls** on either side, their **inner and outer golden light** enveloping your body, transforming you into an **Immortal Official**.
First, swallow a mouthful of **Spirit Palace Qi**, blow it upon your body, then knock the teeth **seven times**, seal the **Spirit Palace Seal**, and silently draw the **Cao**.
For **driving dragons, subduing ghosts, or submitting petitions**, this method is used.

---

**The Divine Light Talisman**
**Heavenly Thunder of the Spirit Palace**, **Earthly Thunder of the Nine Fortifications**.
**Water Thunder of the Abyssal Caverns**, **Wind Thunder of the Eastern Tree**.
**Ghost Thunder of the Mountains and Valleys**, a hundred valleys facing the **Sun**.
The **Great One’s Edict** commands: **"Burn the Ghost Fire."**
The **Thunder** is swift across **Heaven and Earth**; a hundred evils have no deceit.
Descending into the **viscera**, it flows smoothly and harmoniously.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Great One’s Decree** commands.

**The Talisman:**
On a day when **thunder sounds**, face the **cardinal direction** while reciting the spell.
**Heavenly Thunder**: write in **yellow** on **green** paper;
**Earthly Thunder**: write in **white** on **red** paper;
**Water Thunder**: write in **black** on **white** paper;

**Wind Thunder**: write in **blue-green** on **black** paper;
**Ghost Thunder**: write in **white** on **black** paper.
**Absorbing qi**: nine breaths from **Heaven**, ten from **Earth**, five from **Water**, three from **Wind**, one from **Ghost**—swallow while facing the cardinal direction.

Swallow the talisman for one day, and a hundred evils will flee in terror, their cries like urgent thunder, all meridians harmonized and flowing.
For infantile convulsions or possession by flying corpses, deploy **black qi** and the child will be at ease.

**Talisman of the True Yin and Yang Qi of Heaven and Earth**
Heaven and Earth’s eight and nine, humanity and spirit’s six and seven.
Pure and turbid, gold clears and separates—
Enter my divine fields, the **Great Granary** receives blessings.
The **Cavern Palace** is pure and clear, foul vapors dare not touch.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Supreme Sovereign of the Celestial Clarity’s Edict** commands.

This talisman: on **Winter Solstice** and **Summer Solstice**, face **west** and swallow **Earth qi** eighteen times.
On **Summer Solstice**, face **east** and swallow **Heaven qi** nineteen times.
Recite the spell and exhale the talisman.
On **yang days**, write in **red**; on **yin days**, write in **black**.
Swallow it, and the limbs will be attuned, a hundred ailments repelled.

**Talisman of the Nine Qi of Solar and Lunar Eclipses**
The **Roaming Moon’s True Essence**, the **Great Yin’s waxing and waning**.
Cold departs, heat arrives—the **Great Sun’s** fullness and decline.
Within, the **Three Corpses** reside, a hundred **passes** arrayed.
One breath of true qi enters, and the corpse-worms scatter and perish.
**Swiftly, swiftly**—as the **Supreme Sovereign of the Celestial Splendor’s Edict** commands.

This talisman: on days of the **Sun’s fullness** and **Moon’s fullness**, use the tongue to exhale and emit.
Nine breaths of the **Sun**, ten breaths of the **Moon** form the talisman.
Wear it swallowed, banishing the **Three Corpses** and **Nine Worms**.
Exhaled qi dissolves poison, blown upon ghosts—ghosts vanish.

**Talisman of the Eastern March Wood Official (Muxia)**: write in **yellow** on **blue-green** paper;
**Talisman of the Southern Pole’s Han Sizhang**: write in **yellow** on **red** paper.

「**Talisman of the Western Ling Gold Mother (Jinmu)**: write in **yellow** on **white** paper;
**Talisman of the Northern Xuanjun**: write in **yellow** on **black** paper;
**Central Yellow Old Official’s Talisman (Huanglao)**: inscribed with the **Sacred Edict of the Dragon Chapter (Yuzhang Shenghao)** and the **Sacred Edict of the Dragon Chapter (Longzhang Tian Shu)**.

This script emerged from the era of **Red Brightness (Chiming)** and the **Great Void (Haojie)**, sealed and entrusted to the **Eight Celestial Children (Bazi)** to subdue the **Celestial Palace (Tian Gong)**.
Hidden in the **Divine Azure Heaven’s (Shenxiao Tian)** Hall of Ultimate Truth, **three ten thousand heavenly maidens (Yunü Tianxian)** perpetually guard the text.

the **root of malevolence**,

**Seal the *qi* of command**, and there shall be no dreams at all.

On days **Jiazi** and **Gengshen**,
write in **cinnabar**,
take at the hour of **human stillness**,
and ingest it.
Seven times, the **corpse-worms** shall depart on their own.
Again, at **dawn and dusk**, with the left hand
caressing the heart and reciting the incantation,

Seven Celestial Officials and Two Mysteries, Three Pure and Nine Azure.
**Táokāng of the Great One**, ascending to the **Three Pure Ones**.

to seize and contemplate the **Yellow Peace**!
At dusk, summon the **Seven Ghostly Attachments**;
at dawn, call upon the **Three Spirits**!
When the spirit is **suppressed** and the *qi* is **refreshed**,
should any **inauspiciousness** arise,
the **Seven-Star Divine Soldiers**,
but summon the **True Spirit**!
Let **filth flow** and **refine the form**,
**sever and destroy** the **demonic essence**!
The **Three Spirits** in harmony and gentleness,
the **blood-corpse** and **depraved spirit** shall sink.
The spirit returns to its **scarlet abode**,
facing **auspiciousness and rectitude**!

long preserve my **spirit’s vitality**!

Ascending to the **Celestial Jade Purity**,
the spirit returns to the **Golden Official**,
to **banish all inauspiciousness**!
Should any dare to resist,
**fire-armored soldiers** shall be raised!
The **immortals** command me,
long preserve the **First Year**!
As swift as the **Highest Sovereign’s** decree from the **Celestial Jade Purity**!"

First, on a **Gengshen** day at dawn,
knock the teeth **seventy-two times**,
and take the **play of *qi* from the southeast**—
**play of *qi* from the southeast**—
into the **Lower Elixir Field**,
transforming into a **baby**.
Having completed the recitation,
use the tongue to press the **upper palate**,
stirring the **inner and outer mouth**,
and **jade essence** shall spontaneously arise.
Rinsing fully, swallow it into the **stomach of the upper baby**.
Its spirit dwells beneath the heart;
when the **Imperial Sovereign** opens his eyes,
it shall then be directed.
In ten days, the face shall radiate **jade light**,
the body shall lose its **wrinkles**,
and **all ailments** shall not arise.
The incantation:

The **Han Palace refines the spirit**, the **Southern Court receives its name**.

and I begin to be born.
**Jade essence** pours into the **Golden Spring**,
the **Golden Spring** returns to the **Azure True Person**.
In the **white day**, ascending to heaven,
I meet the **Jade Sovereign**.
As swift as the **Highest Sovereign’s** decree!"*

**The Heavenly Sovereign’s Bestowal of the Southern Court’s Method of Refining the Body by the Celestial Jade Official**
*"Heavenly, Heavenly! Pay me my **original spirit**!
**Li** shall have few **ailments**,
**Kàn** shall have no **form-spirit**!
Sever the **hundred demonic barriers**,
sweep away the **flames of the One True**!
I command with **reverent virtue**,
the **Heavenly Court’s Azure Water**!
Cooked and refined with fire,
**roasted** into the **womb of the embryo**!
I practice this method,
and **fire-light flows through my form**!
The **Five Sovereigns** guard me,
and I ascend to the **Heavenly Dawn**!
As swift as the **Southern Court’s** decree by **Han Lord’s** father-in-law!"*

Rightward, at **six Yang times**,
facing **south** and reciting the incantation,
**absorb and bind the One *qi*** with the mouth,

**The Method of Restraining the Three Spirits**
The method states:
On the **third, thirteenth, and twenty-third** of each month,
that evening, the **Three Spirits** shall abandon the body and wander outside.
Those who seize them
should recline on their back,
remove the pillow,
extend the feet,
and cross the hands over the heart.
Close the eyes,
seal the *qi* for **three breaths**,
knock the teeth **three times**.
Preserve in the heart a **red *qi****, like a **chicken egg** emerging from within and exiting the mouth.
The *qi* shall be like fire,
enveloping the body all around—
when aware, the body shall feel slightly warm.
Call upon the **Three Spirits**.
The incantation:

The **Celestial Palace of Taiwei**, within the **Central Yellow**—
beginning with **Azure Primordial**.
**Refine the Three Spirits within**,
nurturing the **Embryonic Light** in tranquility.
The **Divine Treasure Chamber of Jade**—
born with me, never straying.
**Do not move recklessly**—
the **Yellow Court** watches over the **Spirit Sovereign**,
the **Supreme Spirit** guards in vigilance.
If you wish to **ascend and soar**,
only to the **Jade Purity** you shall go.
**Hunger and thirst?**—
swallow and drink the **Jade Crystal**.

**Urgent as the True Person of Taiyi, the Three Platforms Jade Emperor’s Edict.**

**The Method of Restraining the Seven Souls**
On the **first, fifteenth, and thirtieth** of each month,
or the **twenty-first and nineteenth** in short months,
the **Seven Souls** wander and conspire with ghosts.
**To bind the Spirits and return the Souls:**

On this day, recline on your back, extend your feet,
cover both ears with your palms, pressing fingers to the crown.
Close your eyes,
seal the *qi* for **seven breaths**,
knock the teeth **seven times**.
Focus in the heart—
a **white *qi*,** the size of a **mung bean**, grows,
gradually expanding through the **nine layers** of the body.
Suddenly, it transforms into **two Azure Dragons** in the eyes,
a **White Tiger** in the nostrils,
a **Vermilion Bird** over the heart,
a **Spirit Serpent** at the left foot,
and a **Azure Tortoise** at the right.
Two maidens in **brocade robes**, bearing **flames of light**, stand at the ear gates.

Swallow the saliva **seven times**,
and call the **Seven Souls** by name:
**Shi Gou, Fu Shi, Que Yin, Tun Zei, Fei Du, Chu Zui, Chou Fei.**
The incantation:

*"The Nine Returns of the Pure *Qi*, restraining the Souls, repelling deceit.
The Heavenly Marshal guards the gate, the maiden holds the pass.
Refine the Souls to gentleness, let them dwell with me in harmony.
Do not move recklessly—
watch over the **Source of Form**.
If hunger or thirst arises, allow the **Yellow Elixir** to be consumed."*

**Incantation before sleep:**

At the time of retiring to bed, the **Four Beasts** shall emerge to guard the body.
The **Azure Dragon** issues from my liver, residing at my left.
The **White Tiger** issues from my lungs, residing at my right.
The **Vermilion Bird** issues from my heart, residing before me.
The **Spirit Serpent** issues from my kidneys, residing behind me.

You, the **Four Beasts**,
grind your teeth and sharpen your blades,
dwelling at my left, right, front, and rear—
repelling all malevolent spirits and wicked ghosts,
keeping them a thousand leagues distant,
so they dare not come near
and disturb my **Jade Chamber**.

Sleep soundly and peacefully,
free from evil dreams and spectral illusions.
**Swiftly, swiftly, as the commandments decree.**

The liver stores the **Soul** (*hun*),
the lungs store the **Soul** (*po*),
the heart stores the **Spirit** (*shen*),
the spleen stores the **Will** (*zhi*),
the kidneys store the **Essence** (*jing*).

The **Azure Dragon** returns to my liver,
the **White Tiger** returns to my lungs,
the **Vermilion Bird** returns to my heart,
the **Spirit Serpent** returns to my kidneys.
The **Yellow Dragon** (*Huang Long*) steadies my spleen,
to fortify my **abdomen** (*real venter*).

No malevolent spirits or wicked ghosts
shall dwell below.
**Swiftly, swiftly, as the commandments decree.**

and pray:

granting me eternal life.

If a man recites this seven times,
or a woman recites it twenty-four times,

**Method for Warding Off Evil Dreams:**
If an evil dream arises, do not speak.

**Morning Ritual for Warding Off Evil Dreams:**
At dawn, spit upon the water facing east. Recite the incantation:
*"May evil dreams cling to grasses and trees,
and auspicious dreams become precious jade."*

**Method for Calming the Five Zang:**
On the night of the new moon, when all is still, lie with your head facing north. Place your left hand upon your heart and recite:
*"O sovereigns of the Five Zang,
divine manifestations of Dao and virtue,
the Sun is your lord, the Moon your lady—
all now guard the True Person [Name].
Men recite seven times, women recite fourteen times,
to prolong life and enhance longevity."*

**Method for Safe Travel:**
Before setting out, keep the *Dou Gang* (Big Dipper’s handle) in mind above your head, silently reciting without pause. Thus, you shall not encounter malevolent spirits, and all paths shall be auspicious.
If going to war, hold the *Dou Bing* (Big Dipper’s handle) before you, pointing at the enemy—great fortune shall follow.
Incantation:
*"The primal power of Heaven, beneficent and unyielding,
swiftly, as the commandments decree."*

**Method for Subduing Demons:**
When sleeping, or walking in darkness, or encountering stubborn, malevolent spirits causing mischief, steady your body and mind, casting aside all distractions. Recite:
*"At the tip of a single hair,
the Jewel King’s realm appears.
Seated in motes of dust,
the Great Dharma Wheel turns.
Extinguishing all sentient beings,
piercing the veil of dusty labor.
Within your subtle awareness,
as wind extinguishes flame.
Like a blade cutting water—
no contact remains.
You are like boiling water,
they are like solid ice.
As warm *qi* approaches,
they shall soon perish."*

**Method for Ceasing Ear Ringing:**
If ear ringing persists, focus your mind and recite:
*"Spirit is present, spirit is present, spirit is present."*

**Incantation to Banish Sleep:**
*"Om! Jidi Yidi Pige Na Dan Di Po Sa Ba He!"*
The master should step onto the left foot upon ascending the bed, clacking the teeth seventy-seven times, preventing sleep.
This practice, when maintained, is supremely refined.

**Method for Warding Off Calamities:**
When the master fears disaster by day or night, or encounters the Three Calamities and Nine Adversities, recite:
*"I take Heaven as my father,
Earth as my mother.
Within them, I dwell as an innocent child.
The Sun is my clerk, the Moon my scribe.
Thunderer and Lightning Mother stand at my sides,

the White Tiger attends my right.

Three on the left, seven on the right,

Two and four as shoulders,

Within this, I dwell—
my abdomen fortified.
Now I command ten thousand ghosts and spirits:

those who betray me shall perish.
Flee swiftly, hide in obscurity!
Heaven’s mighty enforcers,
behead all inauspicious omens!

This incantation repels a hundred evils and the Five Plague spirits, banishing all unrighteous ghosts and deities.

**Method for Restoring the Spirit:**
On the fifteenth and last days of each month, first speak inwardly: *"Spirit, spirit."*
Then, with the left hand pressed upon the heart, whisper:
*"Spirit, spirit, dwell in my palace.
Enter my hall, abide with me.
Speak with me—
never depart from my side."*

**Ritual for Establishing the Altarpiece (建坛式)**

In all cases of establishing the altarpiece,
sit facing south with north at your back,
and arrange the **Three Teacher (三师)** positions.
In the center, place the **Uppermost True (上真)** position;
to the left, the **Divine General (神将)** position;
to the right, the **Dharma Master (法师)** position.
Additionally, set one **Celestial Master (天师)** position,
and place an ink seal box on either side.
Place a peach-branch altar before the table,
and set out a jar of water.
At the heart of the altarpiece,
secure the **mirror-sword (镜剑)**.

**Rite of Prohibition (禁式)**

For those who wish to perform this ritual,
upon entering the chamber,
first recite the **Purification of the Body Incantation (浄身咒)**,
then the **Purification of Heaven and Earth Incantation (浄天地咒)**.
When finished,
next recite the **Incantation for Entering the Gate (入户咒)**.
Visualize the **Functionary Officials’ Divine Soldiers (功曹神兵)** descending from the void to your left and right.
Pinch the second knuckle of your index and middle fingers,
and perform the **Yu Bu (禹步)** in the **Fighting Stance (斗)**.
Gaze toward the southeast and gather *qi*,
blowing it leftward and rightward.
Visualize yourself as the **True King (真王)**,
with the **Four Spirits (四灵)**—left as the **Sun Spirit (日)**, right as the **Moon Spirit (月)**—
the **Five Stars (五星)** above your head,
and the **Twenty-eight Constellations (二十八宿)** encircling you.
The **Divine Mist (神霄)** and **Divine Treasury (神府)** stand beside the Teacher,
like a dense fog.

Then, **order them to be carried out** and apply the **Heavenly Ding Talisman** to **bind the malevolent spirits**, along with the **Divine Warriors and Talismans** previously summoned.

**Seizing Wicked and Malevolent Ghosts**:

Recite the incantation, then grasp the **Ziwei Seal**, mentally invoking the **Great Emperor of the Northern Pole**, the **Three Enclosures**, and the **Northern Dipper’s Natural Covering Head**. Proceed to the shrine’s entrance, fly through the **Heavenly Gang**, step through the **Earth-Memory Array**, and command the **Supervising Officials** to shout each name in turn. The aforementioned soldiers and generals must urgently seize them all under your command.

Burn the **Commanding Demon-Scout Ghost Talisman**, declaring: *"These are demonic bandits—command them seized!"* Deploy the **Thunderfire Talisman**, burning it thoroughly. The **Teacher** invokes lightning—**crackling thunder shakes the earth**, flames fill the sky, and the officials raise their voices in triumph as they seize them.

Next, nail the **Iron Talisman** into the four cardinal directions of the shrine’s grounds, reciting the **Heavenly Gate and Earthly Axis Incantation**, invoking the **Four Directions’ successive movements**—thus, the demons have no place to enter. Reward the officials and soldiers—this method is supremely effective.
Do not use it habitually.

**Method for Invoking Rain in the Height of Summer**

A private chamber must be prepared, swept clean and made pure. Twelve measures of wine, one rooster, and offerings to the **Suppressing Demon** division’s middle-ranking generals are required.

With sword in hand, face the **Xun** direction. Draw a three-tiered altar, upon which are placed wine cups, incense lamps, and tea and fruit. In ritual formation, step toward the **Xun** door and assume the guise of a **Divine General**, sword pointing to the **Xun** direction, and loudly declare:

*"By the command of the Supreme Emperor, I urgently suppress the **Demon Division**. I call each name in turn and summon the **Five Directions’ Barbarian Thunder** messengers. On this month’s certain day, they must swiftly assist me in searching through streams and abyssal pools. Surely there are **Dragon Gods** present—hurry to [specific location], and save all the people from scorching drought!"*

*"Now, in accordance with the law, I have prepared blood wine and **zào money** to reward the **Thunder Division**. On the appointed day and hour, you must govern the great rain—do not defy my command!"*

When the incantation is finished, pour out the wine, and with the sword’s blade pierce the rooster, mixing its blood into the wine until it is evenly blended. The **Thunder Division** generals of the Five Directions will then appear before the altar to receive the sacrifice.

After the ritual is complete, dig a pit facing the **Xun** direction within the chamber, and bury the **zào money** and rooster’s blood wine. Place the sword upright upon it, then exit the chamber. As prescribed, prepare the **Rain-Invoking Talisman** and have someone cast it into the location where the **Dragon Gods** dwell.

When the time arrives, great thunder and rain will descend, relieving the drought. Then, give thanks to Heaven’s grace.

**Praying for Clear Weather**

In general, the **Flying Xun** incantation can subdue **Sky Gods**, while the **Treading Ji** incantation can subdue **Earthly Deities**. To govern the **Three Realms’** ghosts and gods, one must not neglect the **Flying Xun** and **Treading Ji** methods—how else could one achieve great deeds and manifest **virtue/power**, if these were mere empty exertions of effort?

For calming **void-dwelling malevolent ghosts** or **frenzied winds and torrential rains**, and for traversing perilous seas or mountains in times of danger, these methods suffice.

If the **Subduing Frenzied Evil** method is employed, the left and right hands must be reversed and the steps retraced.

Next, use the **Flying Xun** and **Treading Ji** incantations. With the right hand, point to the direction of the calamity, and the ghosts and gods will collapse, the clouds and rains will disperse, all **demons and malevolent forces** will be annihilated, and **prolonged rains** will not harm crops or people.

If a violent wind snaps trees, the ritual master must transform into a **Divine General** in **auspicious attire**, arrange the items in reverse order, and then recite the **Flying Xun** and **Treading Ji** incantations three times. With the right hand, point to the clouds and loudly declare:

*"By the command of the Supreme Emperor, I order the violent winds and torrential rains to cease immediately! You **Dragon Gods** who command the clouds, swiftly obey the imperial decree and disperse the clouds, halting the rain!"*

The winds and rains will then stop. If they do not, repeat the method, using the **Binding Dragon Spirit Official** to subdue them—this is supremely effective.

Next, petition the **Supreme Emperor’s Three Teachers**, and inform the **Dragon God Master of Rain** to swiftly forbid the rain. Set the **Altar of Transmission and Oath** in proper order:

*"This humble servant of [specific village], holding the office of [specific position], surnamed [surname], aged [number], born in the year [year]. I am under the jurisdiction of the **Big Dipper’s** [specific star] Lord. Deeply moved by the insignificant merits of this humble one, I reverently admire the **Dao/Way’s** transformations. With sincere devotion, I humbly present this pledge of sincerity, proffering it to the door of [surname] Lord. *"After receiving this method, it shall forever be a treasure of my body. I dare not disobey the Teacher’s words or recklessly transmit this to others, nor leak the sacred texts. Should I violate this even once, I shall willingly offer my body to the **Three Officials**, be tried by the **Wind Blade**, and bring misfortune upon the **Mysterious Ancestors**. I will not be pardoned in ten thousand kalpas, nor dare I blame the **Dao/Way** or accuse the Teacher."*

*"I have solemnly presented this petition, awaiting the Teacher’s compassionate grace to grant me the opportunity to prostrate and plead. I humbly await the Teacher’s command."*

*"I am sincerely fearful and trembling, bowing my head and kneeling. I have solemnly presented this petition, awaiting the imperial decree."*

2. Do not rebel against or disrespect one’s parents, teachers, and friends (不得悖逆父母師友).

Next, the **Five Precepts of Conduct** (五戒行):
1. Abstain from lust and greed (戒非色非財).
2. Refrain from killing and causing harm (戒殺物傷情).
3. Avoid strange desires, jealousy, and deceit (戒怪貪嫉拓).
4. Do not seek favor through crooked or insidious means (戒請曲邪佞).
5. Maintain equanimity and avoid erratic moods (戒喜怒變常).

Next, the **Seven Rectitudes** (七正直):
1. Let **orthodox faith** (正信) be the foundation of goodness (以正信為善根).
2. Let **orthodox sincerity** (正真) and mindfulness be the means to align with the Celestial Will (以正真留意，上應天心).
3. Let **loyalty** (忠) benefit the nation and **filial piety** (孝) be reverent toward one’s kin (以忠利於國，孝穆於親).
4. Let **orthodox faith** (正信) follow the Master’s instructions (以正信從師訓).
5. Let **rectitude** (正直) harmonize with one’s relatives and dependents (以正直和穆六親眷屬).
6. Let **orthodox discernment** (正絶) reject falsehood and avoid entanglement with evil (以正絶聽是非，邪不干正).
7. Let **honest transactions** (市價斗稱) be conducted with fairness and straightforwardness (平直交易).

Next, the **Six Prohibitions Against Listening to Crooked Speeches** (六不聽曲詞):
1. Do not accept petitions from those who harbor resentment, jealousy, or deceit, or whose motives are unclear (察有嗔妬奸濫不明者，不得受狀).
2. Do not accept petitions from people who deceive, steal, or engage in clandestine affairs (凡人欺詐奸竊，事屬暗昧，不得受狀).
3. Do not accept petitions from those who falsely accuse others to incite officials or soldiers, causing harm or injury to others (假以財物，求梼妄動吏兵，害物傷命，不得受狀).
4. Do not hear cases from envious monks who seek vengeance against others (為冤僧嫉妬，欲求報對者，不得受理).
5. Do not accept petitions regarding unclear property disputes or the pursuit of deceased individuals’ belongings through dubious means (財物不明，亡者往來追攝，似乎機變者，不得受理).
6. Do not hear cases from those who falsely sue officials, seeking punishment after a clear judgment has already been made (民有冤枉，已經明斷，妄訟官吏，欲求警報者，不得受理).

The decree is as stated above. I humbly pray to follow the **rituals and principles** (科式), without failing in propriety and decorum (毋失規儀).」

In accordance with this **符’s decree** (*准此符命*), I command that the **departed Certain be swiftly elevated** (*速得超生*), **cease their torment in the Cold Hall** (*罢对寒庭*), and **have their evil records expunged** (*削除恶簿*).

As per the **law of the Supreme Daoist Sovereign** (*神霄真王律令*).

**Dispatch awaiting arrival** (*牒候到*), I **humbly submit this decree** (*仰准前符命*) to the **Underworld’s Three Officials** (*地狱三官*), the **Nine Ministries** (*九府*), the **One Hundred and Twenty Departments** (*百二十曹*), the **Five Emperors’ Judges** (*五帝考官*), the **punishing deities of the Nine Dark Hells** (*九幽地狱执罚神兵*), the **prison wardens of the Bull-Head Prison** (*牛头狱卒*), the **Great Demons of the Three Realms** (*三界大魔*), and all **Underworld officials** (*地府一切冥官主者*):

**Receive this符’s decree**; the **Underworld’s torments must halt** (*地府停苦*), and upon the **符’s arrival**, these orders must be **faithfully executed** (*符到奉行*).

**Seal of the Dispatch** (*故牒*).
**太歲　年　月　日　时牒。**
**具法位，姓某押。**

---
**投简表式**

**具位，小兆，臣姓某，**
**诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜**

**上言:** I, Certain, **humble and reverent**, **prostrate myself twice** (*稽首顿首*), and **bow twice** (*再拜*), submitting this **petition** (*表式*):

I act upon the **intention of the living** (*入意*), **establishing a wish for life** (*建生*). I **humbly offer** to the **Supreme** (*上属*):

**The Certain Star of the Northern Dipper** (*北斗某星君*).

I, Certain, **have long harbored a devout aspiration** (*先有愿心*), to **pay homage to the Five Sacred Mountains and Four Great Marshes** (*朝礼五岳、四渎*), the **Heavenly Caverns of Blessed Lands** (*洞天福地*).

I **present this petition** (*献投简文*), **reporting to the Supreme Dao** (*大道*), **Heaven and Earth** (*天地*), and **the恩 of my parents** who nurtured me, as well as the **enlightening恩 of the Three Celestial Luminaries** (*三光*), the **enlightening恩 of the Sovereign, Water, and Land** (*国王、水土*), and the **enlightening恩 of my teachers, friends, and guides** (*师友传度*).

I **offer this prayer** (*上祝*): May the **current sovereign** (*当今*), **live as long as Heaven and Earth** (*寿同天地*), and **permanently govern the mountains and rivers** (*永镇山河*).

**Further Petition:**

I **also wish** that the **Way** may **remove my nine ancestral sins** (*九祖之愆*) from the past and **forgive my three lifetimes’ offenses** (*三世之罪*) in the future.

I **fortuitously encounter the holy age** (*圣代*), and **aspire to emulate the true Dao** (*真风*). Though my **coarse mortal body** (*俗骨*) and **ordinary life** (*凡胎*) are burdened with **long-standing remorse** (*尤悔*), my **practice of the Dao remains shallow** (*道行闻浅*), and I **fail to grasp ultimate truth** (*至真*).

Unworthy to **penetrate mysteries and attain profound insight** (*通幽洞彻*), I **cannot accumulate merit to repay** (*积功图报*).

With reverence, I **hear of the Five Sacred Mountains and Four Great Marshes**, the **Heavenly Caverns of Blessed Lands** (*洞天福地*), and the **Purple Palace of True Capital** (*紫府真都*), the **sole abode where Immortals descend to bless** (*神仙降佑之乡*).

Thus, I, a **seeker of the Dao** (*学道祈求之士*), **humble myself before the True Spirit** (*真灵*), beseeching **gracious discernment** (*洞鉴*).

May You **pardon all my transgressions** (*过咎*) and **cleanse my sins** (*愆尤*).

Grant that my **Daoist rites and talismans** (*法箓*) may **sever evil** (*斩邪*), so that I may **return to the True Immortals** (*归正仙*).

With **martial assistance** (*兵佐助*) to **guide my path** (*随行*), I shall **cultivate the Dao and refine my essence** (*修真*), **transcending the mundane to attain sainthood** (*超凡入圣*).

I am **utterly moved and earnest** (*无任激切*), my **devotion unshaken** (*屏营之至*).

Respectfully spoken:

**The Celestial Year** (*太岁*) of **Year**, **Month** of **Month**, **Day** of **Day**,
**Possessed by the Dao** (*法位*), **Small Seal** (*小兆*), **Subject** (*臣*) **Certain** (*姓某*) **petitions** (*表奏*).

**Petition to the Holy Mother** (*奏圣母式*)
**Possessed by the Dao** (*法位*), **Small Seal** (*小兆*), **Subject** (*臣*) **Certain** (*姓某*).

I **do not fear the punishment of the executioner’s axe** (*斧越之诛*), and **dare to seek audience with the Supreme Primordial** (*重玄之听*).

「I, your humble servant, was yesterday instructed by **Reverend Master** (*度师*) **Certain** (*某君*) of the Inner Mongolia region in the **Jade Purity, Divine Dawn** (*玉清神霄*) **Great Dao** (*大法*), including the **One Stage God-General** (*一阶神将*) **talismans and seals** (*符印*), vowing to **assist the Celestial True One** (*天真*) in **propagating the orthodox transformation** (*宣扬正化*), **relieving the people’s suffering** (*救民疾苦*), **curing illnesses and banishing malevolent spirits** (*治病除邪*), and **refining both body and mind** (*修炼身心*), with the aspiration to **ascend to the Jade Bureau** (*升玉府*).

In reflection, your servant is a **filthy mortal in a degenerate age** (*浊世行尸*), of **profane essence** (*凡间秽质*), yet by **fate’s grace** (*宿运*), I was placed among humanity, and through **fortune’s blessing** (*真荃*), I received the **Great Dao** (*大法*). I **rely on the lofty immortals** (*高真*) to **bestow mercy upon the world** (*俯垂济世*).

Though my **virtue is slight and my Dao shallow** (*功微道浅*), my **power is meager and my conduct weak** (*德薄行衰*), I have **recklessly advanced to the Immortal Stage** (*滥进仙阶*), yet no **meritorious deeds** (*有功可记*) are recorded in my **actions and retreats** (*行藏*).

Thus, I have **offended in both motion and stillness** (*致犯动静成愆*), and **my mouth, hands, heart, and body have violated the Dao’s prohibitions** (*口掌心身有违科禁*). With **ten thousand faults and myriad sins** (*千愆万罪*), exposed to **both light and dark punishments** (*阳过阴诛*), I **daily tremble in fear with no means to repent** (*夙夜竞惶无门忏谢*).

Fortunately, on this **auspicious day** (*吉日*), I **offer morning rites to the Primordial Lord** (*朝礼元君*), earnestly **praying for compassionate aid** (*特希哀佑*) and **merciful enlightenment** (*愍以愚蒙*).

Your servant **respectfully records this petition** (*谨录状奏*) to **those who hear** (*闻者*).

---
**Rightfully, your servant respectfully records this petition** (*右臣谨录状上奏*) and **submits it to the Primordial Dao Ancestor, Holy Mother Primordial Lord** (*元始开天道祖圣母元君御前*), humbly **hoping that the Dao’s benevolence will grant my petition** (*伏望道慈允臣所奏*), and **praying for a vigorous command** (*乞赐劲命*) to **forgive and absolve me, your servant Certain** (*赦宥臣某*), **clearing my guilt and misfortune** (*罪冤消释*), **and allowing me to attain serene peace** (*得获清宁*). Thus, your servant may **devoutly seek the Dao through the law** (*奉法求真*) and **swiftly receive the numinous response** (*速蒙灵应*), **granting my sincere prayers immediate communion** (*允臣虔祷立获感通*).

**Ever indebted to the boundless Dao’s grace** (*仰荷大道罔极之恩*), your servant is **utterly moved and earnest** (*无任激切*), **devotion unshaken** (*屏营之至*). I **respectfully submit this** (*谨具以闻*).

**Respectfully submitted** (*谨奏*).
**The Celestial Year** (*太岁*) of **Year**, **Month** of **Month**, **Day** of **Day**,
**Possessed by the Dao** (*具位*), **Small Seal** (*小兆*), **Subject** (*臣*) **Certain** (*姓某*) **petitions** (*状*).

**Submitted to the Three Teachers** (*奏三师*)
**Possessed by the Dao** (*具位*), **Small Seal** (*小兆*), **Subject** (*臣*) **Certain** (*姓某*).

Your servant **respectfully states that** (*臣谨据某*), yesterday on **Year, Month, Day** (*某年月日*), **I suffered from** (*得何病证*) **a certain illness** (*某病*), suddenly **assailed by mountain goblins and malevolent spirits** (*山魈鬼神*), causing me to **whirl in madness day and night** (*日夜颠狂*), **to act disorderly in speech and call out in chaos** (*作乱言语呼唤*), and **to invoke myriad evil spirits** (*口称邪祟不一*).

Though I **exhausted all means through priests, shamans, and medical treatments** (*累经师巫医药*), they **failed to subdue** (*制伏不下*) the affliction, and it remains **a stubborn and cunning malevolence** (*顽猾奸狡*).

I **still fear for my life** (*尚虑性命难存*) and **grieve for my kin** (*骨肉怀忧*), unable to **find cessation** (*得止*).

Thus, I **submit my case to you, my Lord** (*具状投臣*), **pleading for salvation and treatment** (*乞行救治*).

Your servant **sees the earnestness of the supplicant’s words** (*切见本人投词恳切*), **and dare not refuse** (*不敢抑绝*). Therefore, on **Month, Day** (*今月某日*), I **shall establish the Divine Dawn Water-Fire Tribunal** (*建置神霄水火狱*) at the **east-southeast corner of Certain’s home** (*某家东南方上*), **requesting the descent of the Three Offices and Five Thunder God-Generals** (*乞降三司五雷将吏*) to **the site’s entrance** (*诣地头*), **to apprehend the mountain goblins and malevolent spirits** (*收捉某身中为祸山魈等祟*) **that plague me** (*赴狱考治*), and **to rescue and aid the living** (*救济生人*).

**This shall be done upon your decree** (*须至奏闻者*).

---
**Rightfully, your servant respectfully records this petition** (*右臣谨录状*) and **submits it** (*上奏*).」

「The venerable Patriarch, the Most Exalted God of Divine Dawn, the Jade Purity True King of Eternal Life, the宗师 (Master of the Doctrine), the Most Exalted God of Divine Dawn, the Jade Purity King of Eastern Hua, and the真师 (True Master), the Nine-Heaven Beneficent Calculator, the Lord of Destiny and Benevolent Generations, the Good-Generating Han the Elder—**humbly implore** (*伏望*) **the Heavenly Mercy** (*天慈*) **to grant favor** (*俞允*), **specially descending a decree** (*特降勑命*), **to notify the Three Offices and Five Thunders** (*告下三司五雷*), **commanding the mighty divine generals** (*部领威猛神将*), **valiant soldiers, and prison officials** (*精兵狱吏*), **to swiftly proceed to the site** (*俓诣地头*), **and apprehend the aforementioned mountain goblins** (*收捉上件山魈*), **malevolent spirits and demons** (*邪妖等祟*), **corpse spirits** (*伏尸*), **serpent spirits** (*蛇精*), **and the Five Wayfarers** (*五通*), **to bring them to the Heavenly Prison for examination and punishment** (*赴狱考治*), **and reveal their traces** (*显现综迹*).

**Then, through their intervention**, **to escort and assist in the exorcism** (*转凭解送，佐助行持*), **to relieve suffering and cure illness, to expel evil** (*救济疾苦，治病驱邪*), **and to universally grant blessings of understanding** (*咸赐感通*), **thus demonstrating the Imperial Sovereign’s virtue of nurturing life** (*以彰上帝好生之德*). Your servant **dares to presume upon** (*冒渎*) **the Heavenly Authority** (*天威*), **and the guilt is punishable by ten thousand deaths** (*罪当万死*). **Humbly awaiting your decree** (*伏候勑旨*).

**In the Year of the Great Celestial Cycle** (*太岁*), **Month, Day** (*年 月 日*).
**Submitted by** (*具位*), **your servant of surname Certain** (*臣姓某状奏*).

**To the City Deity** (*牒城隍*) **and the Jade Purity Divine Dawn Grand Marshal** (*玉清神霄大法司*), **and to the City Deity of Certain’s Prefecture and State** (*牒某府州城隍司之神*):

**Regarding the matter at hand** (*当司据某事*), **your servant humbly petitions for salvation and treatment** (*乞行救治*). Beyond the **Heavenly Talisman already bestowed** (*除已给付天符*), **and the dispatch of Heavenly generals and officials to apprehend** (*差拨天将吏兵收捉外*), **this must be carried out immediately** (*须至行遣者*).

**Urgent notification** (*牒候到*): Upon arrival, **please promptly investigate the aforementioned matter** (*请详前件事理*) and **dispatch mighty and resolute divine generals** (*火急差拨威猛有心力神将*), **commanding officials and soldiers** (*部领吏兵*), **to proceed to the site** (*前至地头*), **and join with this office’s Heavenly generals** (*会合本司天将*), **to search and capture the malevolent spirits and demons afflicting the household** (*於患家核捉为祸邪祟鬼神*), **ensuring none escape** (*毋令走透*), **and all are seized** (*须要捕获*), **to be delivered to the Heavenly Prison for punishment** (*收赴天狱施行*). If any **fail to comply** (*稍有违*), **or deviate from the above instructions** (*不依前件*), **they shall be held accountable** (*的当具奏上帝*), **and severe retribution shall follow** (*重行典宪，立俟报应*).

**Respectfully submitted** (*谨牒*).
**In the Year of the Great Celestial Cycle** (*太岁*), **Month, Day** (*年 月 日*) **notification** (*牒*).

**Submitted by** (*具位*), **your servant of surname Certain** (*姓某押*).

**Official Seal Record** (*关式*): **Jade Purity Divine Dawn Grand Marshal** (*玉清神霄大法司*):

**This office, upon receiving the afflicted’s earnest petition** (*当司据某入意遂投本司救治*), **has verified** (*寻验得*) that **malevolent spirits are indeed present and clearly malevolent** (*委有不正邪祟分明*), **and must be dispatched immediately** (*须至行遣者*).

**Rightfully, in accordance with** (*右，关准*) **the True King’s decree** (*真王勑命*), **the following are hereby ordered**:
- **Total Supervision General** (*差总监大将军*)
- **Commanding General** (*统兵大将军*)
- **□ Black General** (*□黑大将军*) *(Note: The character is unclear; possible options include "Heavenly" or "Dark," but "Black" is retained for consistency with the context of thunder generals)*
- **Historical Black General** (*历黑大将军*)
**to join with the Lord of Demons** (*会合命魔*), **leading the assault to slay demons** (*前驱杀鬼*).

**The generals, officials, and talisman bearers** (*符中将吏、功曹、符使*), **must swiftly go to the site** (*疾速前去地头*) **and search for all malevolent spirits and demons within the afflicted person** (*搜捉患人身中一切为祸鬼邪*), **regardless of rank or relation** (*不问高下亲疏*), **immediately seizing them upon their appearance** (*即仰应时摄赴患体*), **and transmitting through the proper channels** (*借口通传*). If any **do not submit** (*不伏*), **they must be interrogated and examined on the spot** (*仰一面絣吊考问*), **with no delay or negligence** (*不得慢易*). **They must await this office’s arrival for final resolution and dispatch** (*切待本司到来，结绝解送*).

**Failure to follow the law shall not be pardoned** (*倘不遵依法律，罪无轻恕*). **This is to be executed with utmost urgency** (*火急奉行*).

**Thus sealed** (*故关*).」

**Annual Seal for the Yearly, Monthly, and Daily Command**

**Name and Rank:** [Name], [Title] in charge.

**Summoning of Officials and Soldiers:** Urgently notify the **Highest God of the Celestial Palace, the Jade Clarity King** (*高上神霄玉清王*), that the **True King’s decree** (*真王勑命*) summons **my divine soldiers** (*某神兵*).

**Talisman:** The decree summons **my generals and officials** (*某将吏多少*), ordering them to assemble at the **sacred altar** (*灵坛*) of **[Location]**, for an urgent matter.

**Highest Celestial King’s Decree:** The **Highest Celestial King** (*高上神霄王*) summons **my deity** (*某神*), to investigate the **original cause** (*元因*), and to issue a proclamation upon arrival to execute the command.

**Acting on behalf of Heaven, enforcing the Dao:** Exterminate evil and annihilate malevolent spirits (*除邪灭精*). **Thousands shall be beheaded; ten-thousands shall be presented** (*千千截首，万万来呈*). **If one fails to appear, their brains shall be shattered and their bodies destroyed** (*一人不到，碎脑殒身*).

**True King’s Command:** Let **Dragon and Tiger generals** (*龙虎*) **rush forth in unison** (*交奔*). **Divine soldiers’ commanders** (*神兵主者*), upon receiving this talisman, must act swiftly (*速行*). If there is any resistance, report it to the **Imperial Sovereign** (*帝君*). **As per the decree, transmit by wind-fire courier** (*风火驿传*).

**Sealed at the Yearly, Monthly, and Daily Command Hour of the Year:** **[Year], Month, Day** (*太岁　年　月　日时*), at the **sacred altar of [Location]** (*某处灵坛*).

**Name and Rank:** **[Name], [Title]** (*姓某*).

**Completion of the 12th Volume of the Great Law of the Purple Scripture of the True Jade Clarity King of the Highest Celestial Palace** (*高上神霄玉清真王紫书大法卷之十二竟*).

chunks.original_text: 高上神霄玉清真王紫书大法 经名：高上神霄玉清真王紫书大法。 撰人不详，约出於北宋末南宋初。 系神霄派道法书。 十二卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 高上神霄紫书大法序 昔太空未成，元炁未生。 元始天王，为昊莽凕涬大梵之祖，凝神结胎，名日混沌。 混沌既拆，乃有天地中外之炁，方名混虚。 元始天王，运化开图。 金容赫日，玉相如天。 陶育妙精，分辟乾坤。 乃自玉京上山下游，遇万炁祖母太玄玉极元景自然九天上玄玉清神母，行上清大洞雌雄三一混化之道，生子八人。 长日南极长生大帝，亦号九龙扶桑日宫大帝，亦号高上神霄玉清王，一身三名，其圣一也。 神霄真王，凝神金阙。 思念世间，一切众生。 三灾八难，一切众苦。 九幽泉酆，一切罪魂。 受报绿对，浩劫相求。 无量众苦，不舍昼夜。 生死往来，如旋车轮。 我今以神通力，悯三界一切众生，即诣玉清天中，元始上帝金阙之下。 礼请殷葱，乞问紫微上宫紫玉琼蕊之笈，於九霄宝箓之内，请《神霄真王秘法》一部三卷，皆梵炁成文，九天太玄云霞之书。 上隐万天之禁； 中隐神仙万年之法；
chunks.translated_text:
**High Supreme Daoist Scripture of the Celestial Palace: The *Zishu* Scripture of the High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Jade Purity**

**Author Unknown**, composed approximately in the late Northern Song or early Southern Song dynasty.
A scripture of the **Shenxiao** Daoist sect. Twelve volumes.
Source of the base text: *Zhengtong Daozang* Canon, First Proper Division.

**Preface to the *Zishu* Scripture of the High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Celestial Palace**

In antiquity, before the **Great Void** (*Taikong*) was formed and the **original *qi*** (*yuánqì*) emerged,
the **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** (*Yuánshǐ Tiānwáng*), as progenitor of the **vast and boundless Great Brahman** (*hàománg dàfán*), condensed his spirit and conceived a form, named it **Hundun** (混沌).
When **Hundun** was dispersed, the **original *qi*** of heaven and earth, within and without, was manifest—then called **Hunxu** (混虚).
The **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign**, through his transformative power, unfolded the cosmic pattern.
His golden visage shone like the sun, his jade likeness radiated like the heavens.
He nurtured the **wondrous essence** (*miàojīng*), partitioning the **Heavenly and Earthly** (*qiánkūn*).
Thus, descending from the **Jade Capital** (*Yùjīng*) mountain and ascending through the celestial realms,
he encountered the **Primordial Mother of Ten Thousand *Qi*** (*Tà Xuán Yùjí Yuánjǐng Zìrán Jiǔtiān Shàng Xuán Yùqīng Shénmǔ*), the **Great Ancestral Mother of the Nine Heavens**,
and practiced the **Dao of the Great Cavern of the High Supreme Purity** (*Shàngqīng Dàdòng Cīxióng Sānyī Hùnhuà*), the **triune unity of yin and yang**,
and bore eight children.

The eldest was the **Long-Lived Sovereign of the Southern Extremity** (*Nánjí Chángshēng Dàdì*), also known as the **Great Sovereign of the Nine Dragons and the Fuxi Sun Palace** (*Jiǔlóng Fúsāng Rìgōng Dàdì*), also known as the **High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Jade Purity** (*Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Wáng*).
One body, three names—his holiness is singular.

The **High Supreme Daoist Sovereign of the Celestial Palace** (*Shénxiāo Zhēnwáng*), with his spirit condensed at the **Golden Gate** (*Jīnquè*),
reflected upon the world and all beings,
the **three calamities and eight hardships** (*sānzāi bānàn*) of all suffering,
the **nine abyssal prisons and the Green Anticipation** (*jiǔyōu quánchéng*), where all guilty souls endure retribution,
the endless torments that never cease day or night,
the **cyclic wheel of birth and death** (*shēngsǐ wǎnglái*).
Now, with my **divine powers** (*shéntōnglì*), I pity all beings in the **Three Realms** (*sānjiè*),
and thus proceed to the **Jade Purity Heaven** (*Yùqīng Tiān*), beneath the **Golden Gate of the Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** (*Yuánshǐ Shàngdì Jīnquè*).
With reverent offerings, I beseech the **Purple Microstar Celestial Palace** (*Zǐwēi Shànggōng*), the **Purple Jade and Precious Orchid** (*Zǐyù Qióngruǐ*) scriptures,
and within the **Nine Heavens Treasure Register** (*Jiǔxiāo Bǎogǔ*), I request the **Secret Dao of the High Supreme Sovereign** (*Shénxiāo Zhēnwáng Mìfǎ*), three volumes in total,
all composed of **Brahmanic *qi*** (*fánqì*), the **scriptures of the Nine Heavens’ Great Primordial Clouds and Mist** (*Jiǔtiān Tà Xuán Yúnxiá*).
The **uppermost** (*shàng*) conceals the **prohibitions of the Ten Thousand Heavens** (*wàn tiān zhǐjìn*);
the **middle** (*zhōng*) conceals the **Dao of immortality spanning Ten Thousand Years** (*shénxiān wànián fǎ*).

chunks.original_text: 下明治人治鬼，保国宁家之道。 元始上帝即敕太皇万福真君，以高上神霄玉清王长生护命秘法，传付下世，首教於我，以布世间学真之士，佩法修行，永为身宝。 上卫帝王，安镇国土，享祚万年； 下以为民，延生度厄，学道成真。 面拜真王，驱除六天，降伏魔魅。 用以施行符檄，召摄鬼神。 一如神霄王所敕，及亿曾万祖，宗绪种亲，离苦升迁。 一身蒙福，万万安荣。 次使自身得道，尸解隐迁，代代流传，法门护持，使道通达； 轻泄漏慢，风刀考，万劫不原。 学士行之，切宜遵守矣。 高上神霄玉清真王紫书大法卷之一 总序大法源 大罗紫府天中，有诸群府。 诸帝之会，天帝之阙，万二千八十所隶，各有司存，悉皆检察人间善恶功过，别无纪籍，以为报施。 故贫贱富贵寿夭，未尝为之予夺，尽出人之自召示应。 诸府阙，以昊天玉皇上帝为宗师。 而神霄玉清王，今玉帝就命人主，准神霄玉清府。 又隶诸地山岳鬼神，与北极紫微大帝府符命不同，又非混元上德皇帝所授三天扶教辅元大法师秘箓一等。 今神霄玉清府神吏所辖诸地鬼神告篆，并灵官神吏，使者将军，驱使吏兵，异号玉司，考召灵文。 行此法，每月三九日，神霄玉府神吏降圣朝会，勿饮食荤酒，戒色持斋，切须谨之。 论箓 神霄法箓七阶，以流传於人世。

The **lower** (*xià*) reveals the **Dao of governing humanity and pacifying ghosts**—securing the state and bringing peace to the family.

The **Original Beginning Heavenly Sovereign** thus decreed to the **Supreme Lord of Ten Thousand Blessings, the True Prince** (*Tàihuáng Wànfú Zhēnjūn*), to transmit the **High Supreme Sovereign’s Secret Dao of the Jade Pure Palace for Long Life and Protection of Life** (*Gāoshàng Shénxiāo Yùqīng Wáng Chángshēng Hùmìng Fǎ*) to the mortal realm, first instructing me to propagate it among those in the world who seek the **Dao**, so that they may **wear the law and cultivate**, making it a lasting treasure for their bodies.

Above, it **defends emperors and kings**, stabilizing the land and ensuring a reign of **ten thousand years**.
Below, it **benefits the people**, extending life and delivering them from calamity, so that those who study the **Dao** may attain its truth.

With **face-bowed reverence to the True King**, one **drives away the Six Heavens** and **subdues demons and spirits**.
It is used to **issue talismans and edicts**, summoning and binding ghosts and gods.

As the **High Supreme Sovereign** has commanded, and as the **hundreds of millions of ancestors**—the **lineage of the sacred lineage and kindred spirits**—have ascended beyond suffering, one’s **single body is blessed**, and **ten thousand generations enjoy honor**.

Next, it enables the practitioner to **attain the Dao**, achieving **corporeal ascension and hidden transcendence**, ensuring its transmission through generations, with the **law safeguarded** so that the **Dao may flourish**.
Those who **leak, reveal, or grow lax**—facing the **Wind Knife Trial**—shall not be pardoned even after **ten thousand kalpas**.
Scholars who practice this must **strictly adhere** to it.

---
**The Great Dao Source of the Supreme Law**
**Volume One of the Purple Scripture Great Law of the High Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Pure Palace**

Within the **Great Luo Purple Treasury of the Nine Heavens**, there exist **all the celestial bureaus**.
The **assemblies of the Celestial Emperors**, the **Heavenly Sovereign’s Gate**—with **twelve thousand eight hundred** subordinate domains, each with its officials—**examine the virtues and transgressions of mortals**, recording none in official registers, yet all as **retribution or reward**.
Thus, **poverty and wealth, nobility and ignominy, longevity and early death** are not granted or withheld by decree, but arise entirely from **one’s own karmic summoning and response**.

These bureaus and gates **acknowledge the Jade Emperor of the Boundless Heaven as their sovereign**.
Yet the **High Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Pure Palace**, now commissioned by the Jade Emperor as the **Human Sovereign**, oversees the **Jade Pure Bureau of the High Supreme Sovereign**.
Moreover, he governs **all earthly mountain and ghostly spirits**, differing from the **edicts of the Great Emperor of the Northern Pole, the Purple Microstar**, and is not the **mixed primal virtue of the Supreme Emperor’s Three Heavens Exalted Teaching and Auxiliary Dao Master’s secret scriptures**.

Now, the **celestial officials of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Jade Pure Bureau** oversee the **seals of the earthly ghosts and spirits**, along with the **Spirit Officials and celestial attendants**, the **messengers and generals**, the **diverse-named Jade Officials**, and the **summoned spirit texts**.
This law must be practiced on the **third day of each lunar nine-day period**, when the **celestial officials of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Palace descend to the mortal assembly**. One must **abstain from meat, alcohol, and carnal desires**, observing strict fasting—**this must be observed with utmost care**.

**On the Scriptures**
The **Seven Stages of the High Supreme Sovereign’s Dao Scriptures** are now transmitted to the mortal world.

chunks.original_text: 自古以来，未尝降见。 今得之者，扶身保命，度厄延年。 奉之者，仙官降佑，消珍灾非。 行之者，却灭邪奸，馘除魔鬼。 当值斯文之士，告盟神霄，申奏主宰，得获昭报，然后方可奉行。 不可超越，造次擅用。 切宜遵守，为尚矣。 论秘诀 神霄玉文，琼台秘诀。 则无所不关，无所不摄。 若能自保以奉持，则坐持众妙，立使万神，寂然不动，感而遂通，与众法不同，诸符不一。 倘值斯文之士，万劫一传，有缘有幸，无极无穷，可不勉励，精诚上祈真贶。 若始勤终怠，口是心非，法中灵官将吏，记人功过，毫分无失。 当是时，三官鼓笔无恕。 勿示非人，岂不可谨。 勉之，戒之。 论妙旨 神霄秘文，玉司妙旨。 是谓玄奥，难可寻详。 虽有秘箓依科修奉，未有诀目要旨，喻若衣服裁割已了，究竟不缝，如何披穿。 诀者，缝也。 今将万世秘文，示学真之士。 乃若坚持苦志，将心救物，法箓剪邪，以皈正。 仙兵佐助，以随行。 日就月将，可达神霄之境。 功成名遂，当升浩劫之家。 今列于左，岂不深思允蹈之乎。 论法 神霄法者，藏于华堂，不示人世。 今遇甲辰之昌运，乃道君统人主之辰，所以阐妙道於斯时，度灵文於宝箓，不问高下，传赐奉持。 若乃究而推之，与众法不同，诸符不一。 但以历恳精诚，虔祈灵贶。 阴行阳报，功业无差，不可妄入鬼神情罪。 依条治之，因以功德相拯，庶使幽明，咸被德泽，岂曰小补之哉。 誓法仪 凡行此法，每月三九日，神霄玉府神吏降世，即用灯三盏，黄纸十二帖，合奏状文，用通章印，实封。 其词，上申本院。 烧词毕，香茶酒果，供养至诚，灯灭收之。 如获报应，然后行持。 元始天王曰：吾救太皇万福真君，开紫霄琅笈九霄妙蕴，付於玉帝上子，以阐天风，传度世人，指归正道，得者自仙。 九阳之梵炁，有九九八十一数，是太阳之运。 太阳之日帝九阳扶桑君者，积炁成神霄真王也。 又领南极之职，与韩司陶铸天民，咸证九天，乃得神霄禁文天篆云章，克日升霄。 《华堂之经》，总载必仙之宝，内有十品之科。 子遇其文，以东华注名，克日成真。 此文，有金英灵童一万人，天素真妃一千人，常保其书。 烧香散华，以刊功过。 兆稍有违，七祖一身，常遭神狱之考。 传者，以金龙玉鱼禁锦以付之，告盟十天。 若失斋妄泄，师与弟子同罪，七祖入北都，万宪不原。 兆以之以戒宣盟。 天民斋粥法 百谷五味，流入脾胃。 五藏安宁，尸邪亡坠。 七祖上生天，小兆得仙位。 长生入九霄，久视通圣慧。 急急如高上神霄东华仙君律令救。 右法，取东华炁咽之。 再取炁吹，使百骸九窍调和，三尸九虫消灭。 天民梳头法 玉顶之上泥丸，绛室玄华宝精。 天帝景色长存，王林神光表异。 右为隐月，左为隐日。 六合清练，百神化密。 急急如高上神霄大帝律令敕。 右法，面对生炁方，取炁咽之，方梳头。 反白成炁，大吉大昌也。 天民沐浴冠带法 玉晨宝冠，云被霞裳。 虎裙制魔，流金吐精。 五浊速去，八景光明。 令臣受赐，罪削福臻。 长与神霄，齐真上灵。 急急如高上五老天君律令敕。 右法，存五帝、玉女自月而下，玉童侍立。 取生炁，吹入水中，方可沐浴。 天民盥漱法 天清地明，日月辉晨。 灌我五体，光赫玉清。
